titles.title: Health Insurance Company Advertising Deduction Denial Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny any deduction for advertising health insurance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/14/2009--Introduced. Health Insurance Company Advertising Deduction Denial Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a tax deduction for advertising and other expenses to promote the sale of any insurance which constitutes medical care (health insurance).
